task_description:
# Monster Spawn System

Implement the spawning system that launches monsters from screen edges with varying trajectories, speeds, and spawn rates based on difficulty progression.

## Rationale
Monsters need to appear in a natural, game-like manner (similar to fruit in Fruit Ninja). Proper arc trajectories and varied spawn patterns keep gameplay dynamic.

## User Stories
- As a player, I want monsters to fly up from the edges in satisfying arcs so that I can anticipate and slash them

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Monsters spawn from bottom/sides of screen with arc trajectories
- [ ] Spawn rate increases gradually within a level
- [ ] Multiple monster types (Zombie, Vampire, Ghost) spawn with different frequencies
- [ ] Monsters have gravity and fall back down after reaching peak
- [ ] Spawn patterns feel natural and not overwhelming
